name: The Last Roll
description:
Description:

The Last Roll is a game that is fun to play but one that also has an important meaning. Once you reach the end of the game (only 3 levels) then you will see the powerful meaning of this game.

Controls:

  • A & D - move left and right
  • SPACE - jump
  • Let Mouse Button - Shoot your gun
  • Right Click - right click grapple points to connect
  • Once on grapple use A & D to swing left and right and W & S to climb up them
  • E - read signs
  • Alt + ENTER - fullscreen

Made by Zyger: https://www.youtube.com/zygergfx
